content:
imulator Flights data is sorted based on `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` field to ensure that it is the same as the processing order in the source system. * `rosterId` is retrieved from Crew Roster using `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE` field. * When Unique Key is null, `status`(see Mapping for details) of the associated Crew Flights' records are updated as "CANCELLED" for corresponding `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.TLC`. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_TIME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY.UNO` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |rosterId| | |Data Handling Operation| |tripId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |dutyId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`TLC`| | |code|`XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`CODE`| | |station|`XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP`| | |startDate|`XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD`, `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`|`DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD`+`DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`| |endDate|`XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD`, `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`|`ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD`+`ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`| |position|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`, `XCREW.RANK r`|`d.ASSIGNED_RANK`, `r.RANK`, `r.LONG_NAME_FCT`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.ASSIGNED_RANK` = `XCREW.RANK.RANK`
then `XCREW.RANK.LONG_NAME_FCT`| |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`DMLTYPE$$`, `OLD_NEW$$`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“
or (`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “U“ and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.OLD_NEW$$`
